run:finished: You managed to finish, huh? ... N-not like I care!
exercise:finished: You expected me to praise you?

greet: Curiosity is like a cockroach. It likes to stumble upon secrets that are supposed to stay hidden.
run:waiting: Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm worried about you. But if you don't come back I'll never forgive you.
exercise:waiting: Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm worried about you. But if you don't come back I'll never forgive you.

greet: The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed.
run:waiting: If the king doesn’t move, then his subjects won’t follow. So move, make change.
exercise:waiting: You can't change the world without getting your hands dirty.

greet: Hard work betrays none, but dreams betray many.
run:waiting: It doesn't matter if we're wrong...because every time we go wrong, we'll continue to look for the right answer.
run:finished: Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care. Keep pushing the boundaries
exercise:waiting: It doesn't matter if we're wrong...because every time we go wrong, we'll continue to look for the right answer.
exercise:finished: Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care. Keep pushing the boundaries

welcome: Anyone who gets between me and you can just die!
greet: I love you so much that... I'm willing to kill anyone who dares to hurt you.
